title: Topic 004 Question 112
body: Your on-premises network contains an Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain. The domain contains a server named Server1. Server1 contains an app named App1 that uses AD DS authentication. Remote users access App1 by using a VPN connection to the on-premises network.
You have an Azure AD tenant that syncs with the AD DS domain by using Azure AD Connect.
You need to ensure that the remote users can access App1 without using a VPN. The solution must meet the following requirements:
•	Ensure that the users authenticate by using Azure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA).
What should you include in the solution? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
